description: This file defines Flask routes and handlers for managing a device inventory system, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting device records stored in a MongoDB database.

classes.name: DevicesList
classes.description: Handles listing all devices and creating new devices via GET and POST methods.

classes.name: DeviceDetail
classes.description: Handles retrieving, updating, and deleting a specific device identified by name.

methods.name: _get_collection
methods.description: Connects to MongoDB and returns the specified collection.

methods.name: _error
methods.description: Generates a standardized JSON error response with a status code.

methods.name: _validate_device_create
methods.description: Validates payload for creating a device, ensuring required fields and valid type.

methods.name: _validate_device_update
methods.description: Validates payload for updating a device, ensuring required fields and valid type.
